name: THE LAST PERSON TO MAKE PHYSICAL CONTACT OR BE HIT BY A CAR WINS
name_original: THE LAST PERSON TO MAKE PHYSICAL CONTACT OR BE HIT BY A CAR WINS
description:
you're welcome

made for the zero hour game jam - was working on some character controllers and then threw a bunch of them in here, put a car in there and boom. hit game. or I guess don't-get-hit-game! hahaha! haha! ha!

this one is truly dreadful but i guess that's the spirit of the 0 hour game jam! i am going to bed now so goodnight please have a good sleep and i hope when i wake up this game will have earned me a million dollars and made me the ceo of nintendo :)
(NOTE: if you are the ceo of a different company such as sega or house house or ubisoft, please don't be offended, I will be the CEO of your company too if you want )
